person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The rebels do not want the multinational force to deploy on the ground , for fear it might help the Zairean army regain control of the area .

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the valid "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| --- |
